DOC.brief_summary: The primary aim study determine effectiveness smartphone deliver app young adult smoker quit smoking .
DOC.brief_title: A Randomized Controlled Trial Test Effect Smartphone Quit Smoking Intervention Young Adult Smokers
DOC.detailed_description: The principle study purpose randomize controlled trial determine effectiveness smartphone deliver app young adult smoker smoke cessation six month use randomize controlled trial . Secondary aim study include examine : 1 ) proximal outcome measure cessation behaviour ; 2 ) satisfaction , extent app use use NRT cessation service ; 3 ) mediator cessation outcome condition ; 4 ) incremental cost-effectiveness .
DOC.criteria: Age 19 29 year Currently smoke cigarette daily occasionally Residing Canada Considering quit smoke next 30 day Have Android iPhone OS smartphone Able provide inform consent English comprehension Not refer study participant opposite
